name: U3 Application Information File
summary: Learn about .U3I files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: U3I files are typically named "Manifest.u3i" and are used by the U3 Launcher to describe U3 applications.

description: Contains information about a U3 smart application (.U3P file) in an XML format; includes the application's version, download path, and working parameters.
